name: Birthday Drama
description:
Made for The Impossible Jam, started the day after my wife's birthday.

Help Driver get ready for a coworker's birthday.  Grab ingredients for the cake, dig up a gift, and invite the bosses to join the party!

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click/Drag
  • W, S, A, D to move (sometimes just A and D)
  • Space
  • O
  • 5

Note: You have to hold the Space bar and run into the crate to pick it up, then keep holding Space to hold onto the crate.  In the boss scene, just hold the '5' key and run into them!

Not my best work by far, and sooooo much left undone.  But the challenge was fun and I had a great time.  Hope it's at least halfway understandable!
